name: King's Cup
description: King's Cup is a drinking game played online with friends. A player pulls a card from the card circle and places it on top of the cup in the center face side up. Based on the card that player or all players must take an action, usually leading to one or more people taking a drink.   It is recommended to have 3 or more players before starting the game and to use a VoIP chatting service like Discord.
